content.question: The case United States v. Lopez (1995) struck down the Gun-Free School Zones Act because

choices.label: it violated Fourth Amendment protections against unwarranted searches
Congress exceeded its authority in the use of the commerce clause
the Second Amendment is a right incorporated to the states
students retain their First Amendment rights while attending public schools

content.answer: Congress exceeded its authority in the use of the commerce clause
